table.name: vtiger_vehicles
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vehicles` ( `vehiclesid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` int(11) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_vehiclescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vehiclescf` ( `vehiclesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vehiclesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
